amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which exempts religious corporations, associations, educational institutions, or societies from certain nondiscrimination provisions of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 108-232 to restore civil rights protections to Head Start teachers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 231 (Roll no. 441).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Woolsey.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 231 (Roll no. 441).
